name: Control (itch) (lilrooness)
description:
This game is incomplete, however the first section is playable :)

Controls:

Move the camera with the arrow keys.

Advance the story text with SPACE

Doors d

Rooms r

Comms c

Files f

Known Bugs

- Graphical issue where the CRT effect can make text difficult to read as it the screen-bend moves.

- Text box'scan sometimes overlay on top of one another if you do not advance the story using the space-bar.

- Emily's name floats around the screen (seems to be a problem only with this exported web version).
